org.apache.flink.api.common.functions

接口 GroupCombineFunction<IN,OUT>

  • 类型参数:
    IN - The data type processed by the combine function.
    OUT - The data type emitted by the combine function.
    所有超级接口:
    Function, java.io.Serializable
    所有已知实现类:
    AggregateOperator.AggregatingUdf, CombineToGroupCombineWrapper, FirstReducer, HadoopReduceCombineFunction, PlanUnwrappingGroupCombineOperator.TupleUnwrappingGroupCombiner, PlanUnwrappingReduceGroupOperator.TupleUnwrappingGroupCombinableGroupReducer, PlanUnwrappingSortedGroupCombineOperator.TupleUnwrappingGroupReducer, PlanUnwrappingSortedReduceGroupOperator.TupleUnwrappingGroupCombinableGroupReducer, RichCombineToGroupCombineWrapper, RichGroupCombineFunction, ScalaAggregateOperator.AggregatingUdf, VertexCentricIteration.MessageCombinerUdf

    @Public
public interface GroupCombineFunction<IN,OUT>
extends Function, java.io.Serializable
    Generic interface used for combine functions ("combiners"). Combiners act as auxiliaries to a GroupReduceFunction and "pre-reduce" the data. The combine functions typically do not see the entire group of elements, but only a sub-group.

    Combine functions are frequently helpful in increasing the program efficiency, because they allow the system to reduce the data volume earlier, before the entire groups have been collected.

    This special variant of the combine function supports to return more than one element per group. It is frequently less efficient to use than the CombineFunction.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void combine(java.lang.Iterable<IN> values, Collector<OUT> out)
      The combine method, called (potentially multiple timed) with subgroups of elements.

    • 方法详细资料

      • combine

        void combine(java.lang.Iterable<IN> values,
             Collector<OUT> out)
      throws java.lang.Exception
        The combine method, called (potentially multiple timed) with subgroups of elements.
        参数:
        values - The elements to be combined.
        out - The collector to use to return values from the function.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - The function may throw Exceptions, which will cause the program to cancel, and may trigger the recovery logic.
